full_summary:
### EZ899-231923 - Parking Lot Drainage Upgrade

#### Call for Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** WS3912452962-Doc3915333414
**Solicitation Number:** WS3912452962
**Publication Date:** March 13, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 29, 2023 2:00 PM (EDT)

**Project Overview:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to undertake parking lot drainage upgrades at the Fraser Valley Institution, located at 33344 King Road, Abbotsford, British Columbia. The project involves protecting downstream storm sewers, ditches, and watercourses from siltation and contamination during construction, as well as constructing storm drainage collection, infiltration, and sewerage works, and restoring trenched areas to their original or better condition.

**Scope of Work:**

The scope of work includes:

* Protection of downstream storm sewers, ditches, and watercourses from siltation and contamination during construction
* Construction of storm drainage collection, infiltration, and sewerage works
* Restoration of trenched areas to their original or better condition
* Removal and reconstruction of a paved area around an existing perforated manhole
* Tie-ins, miscellaneous removals, and repairs as necessary

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions:**

The project is located in British Columbia, Canada.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact Chris Morton, SPAC/PSPC, at chris.morton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Attachments:**

Please note that there are no attachments to this tender announcement.

**Access the Tender:**

To access the tender, please visit the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15681751?extsite=MTU2ODE3NTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. 

**Note:**

The tender closing date is March 29, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EDT). All submissions must be received by this deadline to be considered. 

This is a tender announcement for EZ899-231923, a contract to upgrade the parking lot drainage at the Fraser Valley Institution in British Columbia, Canada. 

The Department of Public Works and Government Services
